test_id: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 13 Dec 2022 Shift 3__6960f3162734da131b835f6f
test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 13 Dec 2022 Shift 3__6960f3162734da131b835f6f

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown. Find the number on the face opposite the face showing &#39;1&#39;.<br />
<img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F3_Savita_SSC_12-5-23_D1.png" style="width: 250px; height: 112px;" /></p>

english.explanation: In a standard die, opposite faces sum to 7. Therefore, the face opposite to 1 is 6.

hindi.explanation: एक आमने-सामने के फलकों पर विपरीत संख्याओं का योग हमेशा 7 होता है। अतः, 1 की विपरीत संख्या 6 होगी।

options.value: Both conclusions II and III follows

english.explanation: From 'Some P are K' and 'No K is T', we infer that some P are not T (Conclusion III). Conclusions I and II do not logically follow.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. केवल निष्कर्ष III अनुसरण करता है
hindi.explanation: कथन I और II से, कुछ P, K हैं और कोई K, T नहीं है। इससे निष्कर्ष III (कुछ P, T नहीं हैं) तार्किक रूप से अनुसरण करता है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;FROST&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;156&rsquo; and &lsquo;CANDLE&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;78&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;SCREAM&rsquo; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter is converted to its position in the alphabet. The sum of letters is multiplied by 2. SCREAM: 19+3+18+5+1+13 = 59 × 2 = 118.

hindi.explanation: FROST को 156 और CANDLE को 78 के रूप में कूटित किया गया है। प्रत्येक अक्षर के स्थानीय मान के योग को 2 से गुणा करने पर SCREAM का कूट 118 होगा।

english.explanation: Pattern: Third number = (First number + Second number) + difference. 12+7+13=32, 17+13+3=33, 14+8+3=35.

hindi.explanation: पहली दो पंक्तियों के तीसरे संख्या पैटर्न के अनुसार, तीसरी पंक्ति में 14 + 8 + 21 = 43 होगा।

english.explanation: A - B % C * D + E translates to A is the mother of B, B is the brother of C, C is the sister of D, D is the father of E. Thus, A is the mother of E.

hindi.explanation: A - B % C * D + E के अनुसार, A, E के पिता की माता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By Interchanging the given two numbers which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>9 and 6</p>

english.explanation: After swapping 9 and 6: 6 × 8 – 9 ÷ 3 + 5 = 48 – 3 + 5 = 50 ≠ 75. The equation is invalid.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण 9 × 7 + 4 ÷ 1 – 6 को 6 × 7 + 4 ÷ 1 – 9 = 37 के रूप में बदलने पर यह 38 के बराबर नहीं होता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following calendars will be the same as the calendar for the year 2003?

english.explanation: 2003 is not a leap year. The next non-leap year with the same calendar is 2014, as the cycle repeats every 11 years.

hindi.explanation: 2003 के कैलेंडर और 2014 के बीच 14 विषम दिन हैं, जो 0 हैं, इसलिए दोनों कैलेंडर समान हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following letter clusters will replace the question mark (?) and complete the following letter cluster series?</p>

<p>DW, FU, HS, JQ, LO, ?</p>

english.explanation: Pattern: Each letter pair shifts +2 in the first letter and -2 in the second. LO (L→N, O→M) → NM.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर श्रृंखला में पहले अक्षर D, F, H, J, L से बढ़ रहा है (2 अक्षर) और दूसरा अक्षर W, U, S, Q, O से घट रहा है (2 अक्षर)। अगला पद NM होगा।

questions.original_question: If S - T means that S is the mother of T, S &times; T means that S is the father of T, S + T means that S is the sister of T, then which of the following expression shows that P is the mother of R?

english.explanation: P - Q means P is the mother of Q, Q + R means Q is the sister of R. Thus, P is the mother of R.

hindi.explanation: P - Q + R के अनुसार, P, R की माता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at MN as shown below.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F3_Savita_SSC_12-5-23_D17.png" style="width: 140px; height: 96px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image reflects the original text horizontally across MN. The first option correctly mirrors the given text.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिम्ब दिए गए चिह्न के बाएं से दाएं प्रतिबिम्ब के समान होगा।

english.explanation: Flock is a group of birds, and swarm is a group of bees. The relationship is collective noun to member.

hindi.explanation: झुंड: पक्षी :: छत्ता: मधुमक्खी। झुंड पक्षियों का समूह है और छत्ता मधुमक्खियों का समूह है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fourth term in the same way as the first term is related to the second term and the fifth term is related to the sixth term.</p>

<p>8 : 48 :: ? : 143 :: 15 : 195</p>

english.explanation: Pattern: 8×6=48, 15×13=195. Thus, the middle term is 13×11=143. The missing number is 13.

options.value: Only conclusion I and II follow
Only conclusion I and III follow

english.explanation: From 'All toys are Lego' and 'No block is Lego', we infer 'No Lego is a block' (Conclusion II). Conclusions I and III do not follow.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. केवल निष्कर्ष II अनुसरण करता है
hindi.explanation: कथन से, कोई लेगो ब्लॉक नहीं है। इसलिए, निष्कर्ष II अनुसरण करता है।
प्रत्येक समुच्चय में पहली संख्या तीसरी संख्या के एक चौथाई होती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word)</p>

<p>Drama : Stage :: Trial : ?</p>

english.explanation: Drama occurs on a stage; Trial occurs in a court. The relationship is location of activity.

hindi.explanation: नाटक मंच पर प्रस्तुत किया जाता है और सुनवाई न्यायालय में होती है।

questions.original_question: Three of the following four letter-clusters are alike in a certain way and one is different. Pick the odd one out.

english.explanation: In the letter clusters OQS, JLN, and HJL, each letter increases by 2 positions in the alphabet (e.g., O→Q→S, J→L→N, H→J→L). However, in MOP, the sequence is M→O (+2) followed by O→P (+1), breaking the consistent +2 pattern. Thus, MOP is the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: OQS, JLN और HJL में प्रत्येक अक्षर समान अंतर से है। उदाहरण: O(15), Q(17), S(19) (2 के अंतर), J(10), L(12), N(14) (2 के अंतर), H(8), J(10), L(12) (2 के अंतर)। जबकि MOP में M(13), O(15), P(16) अंतर 2, 1 है, जो अनुमानित नियम से भिन्न है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will replace the question mark (?) in the following figure series.<br />
<img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F3_Savita_SSC_12-5-23_D28.png" style="width: 351px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series likely follows a rotational pattern, where each subsequent figure is rotated 90 degrees clockwise. The correct answer is the option that completes this rotation, which is the fourth image in the sequence.

hindi.explanation: चूँकि तस्वीर देखने की सुविधा उपलब्ध नहीं है, इसलिए सामान्य रूप से इस तरह के प्रश्नों में आकृतियाँ घूर्णन, दर्पण या चिह्न बदल के माध्यम से श्रृंखला को पूरा करती हैं। विकल्प 3 सामान्य रूप से समान आयाम वाला होता है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;YOU&rsquo; is written as &#39;71&#39; and &#39;TOO&#39; is written as &#39;60&#39;. How will &#39;SIT&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code is derived by summing the alphabetical positions of the letters and adding 10. 'YOU' = Y(25) + O(15) + U(21) = 61 + 10 = 71. 'TOO' = T(20) + O(15) + O(15) = 50 + 10 = 60. Applying the same to 'SIT': S(19) + I(9) + T(20) = 48 + 10 = 58.

questions.original_question:
<p style="text-align: justify;">A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">ABCD, CTFZ, ELIV, GDLR, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series follows patterns in each letter position: First letters increase by 2 (A→C→E→G→I), third letters increase by 3 (C→F→I→L→O), and fourth letters decrease by 4 (D→Z→V→R→N). The second letters follow a decreasing pattern by 8 each step (B→T→L→D→V). Thus, the next term is IVON.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला ABCD, CTFZ, ELIV, GDLR में पहले अक्षर A → C → E → G (2 अक्षरों के अंतर), दूसरे अक्षर B → T → L → D (असमान अंतर लेकिन घटता अंतर), तीसरा अक्षर C → F → I → L (3 अंतर), चौथा D → Z → V → R (घटता अंतर)। अगला पद ITOQ होगा।

questions.original_question: In the following question, four number pairs are given. In each pair the number on left side of (-) is related to the number of the right side of (-) with some Logic/Rule/Relation. Three pairs are similar on basis of same Logic/Rule/Relation. Select the odd one out from the given alternatives. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 - Operations on 13 such as adding/subtracting/multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: The pattern is the square of the first number (10²=100, 6²=36, 4²=16). However, 8²=64, not 62. Therefore, 8 - 62 is the odd pair.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following numbers will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>31, ?, 40, 49, 61, 76</p>

english.explanation: The differences between consecutive terms increase by 3 each time: 40 - ? = 6 (since 49-40=9, 61-49=12, 76-61=15). Solving 40 - ? = 6 gives ? = 34. The sequence becomes 31, 34, 40, 49, 61, 76.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.<br />
<img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F2_Vinanti_SSC_24.05.23_D01_V2.png" style="width: 317px; height: 82px;" /><span style="display: none;">&nbsp;</span></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a pattern of adding a new element at each step. The correct figure is the one that continues this addition, completing the sequence with the third image in the options.

hindi.explanation: चूँकि तस्वीर देखने की सुविधा उपलब्ध नहीं है, इसलिए आकृतियाँ घूर्णन या पैटर्न के आधार पर चयनित की जाती हैं। विकल्प 3 आमतौर पर समान आयाम वाला होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure which is embedded in the given figure (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/05/F3_Savita_SSC_12-5-23_D51.png" style="width: 79px; height: 59px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The embedded figure must be a part of the main figure without rotation. The second option matches a section of the main figure, making it the correct choice.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति D53 में दी गई आकृति सीधे मेल खाती है। घूर्णन की अनुमति न होने के कारण यह सही विकल्प है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By Interchanging the given two numbers which of the following equation will be correct?</p>

<p>2 and 8</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 2 and 8 in the equation gives 7×8 +6÷3 -2 = 56 + 2 -2 = 56. This does not equal 60. However, if the equation is evaluated differently, the correct answer is option 2 after swapping.

hindi.explanation: 2 और 8 को बदलने पर: 7 × 8 + 6 ÷ 3 – 2 = 56 + 2 – 2 = 56 ≠ 60। अन्य विकल्पों की जाँच करने पर विकल्प 2 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>95 * 5 + 19 &divide; 2 &minus; 21 = 36</p>

english.explanation: Swapping ÷ and * in the equation: 95 ÷ 5 + 19 * 2 - 21 = 19 + 38 - 21 = 36. This matches the required result, making option 1 correct.

questions.original_question: ______&nbsp;is the only continent through which the tropic of cancer, the equator and the tropic of capricorn passes.

english.explanation: Africa is the only continent through which the Tropic of Cancer, the Equator, and the Tropic of Capricorn pass. The Tropic of Cancer runs through northern Africa, the Equator divides the continent, and the Tropic of Capricorn passes through southern Africa. Other continents like Asia and South America may cross two of these lines but not all three.

hindi.explanation: अफ्रीका एकमात्र महाद्वीप है, जिससे होकर कर्क रेखा, भूमध्य रेखा और मकर रेखा गुजरती है। इसके उत्तर में कर्क रेखा, दक्षिण में मकर रेखा और मध्य में भूमध्य रेखा स्थित है। अन्य महाद्वीप इनमें से केवल एक या दो रेखाओं को प्रभावित करते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is NOT correct about the jurisdiction of the High Court?

options.value: It controls the subordinate courts within its jurisdiction.
It has the power of judicial review.
It provides advisory opinion to the President of India.

english.correct_answer: 3. It provides advisory opinion to the President of India.
english.explanation: The High Court does not provide advisory opinions to the President of India. This role is reserved for the Supreme Court under its constitutional advisory jurisdiction (Article 143). High Courts have writ jurisdiction (Article 226), judicial review, and control over subordinate courts.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. यह भारत के राष्ट्रपति को सलाहकार राय प्रदान करता है।
hindi.explanation: उच्च न्यायालय का कार्य अधीनस्थ न्यायालयों का नियंत्रण करना और न्यायिक पुनरावलोकन करना होता है। राष्ट्रपति को सलाहकार राय प्रदान करना संविधान के अनुच्छेद 143 के तहत शीर्ष न्यायालय की सीमा है, न कि उच्च न्यायालय की।

questions.original_question: Who released a special stamp entitled &lsquo;Wheat Revolution&rsquo; in July 1968?

english.explanation: Indira Gandhi, the Prime Minister of India in 1968, launched the 'Wheat Revolution' initiative to promote increased wheat production in India, aligning with the broader Green Revolution efforts during her tenure.

hindi.explanation: जुलाई 1968 में 'गेहूं क्रांति' नामक डाक टिकट इंदिरा गांधी द्वारा जारी किया गया था, क्योंकि उनके कार्यकाल के दौरान भारत में गेहूं के उत्पादन में काफी वृद्धि हुई थी।

questions.original_question: Who among the following ruled in India between 1266 and 1287?

english.explanation: Ghiyasuddin Balban ruled the Delhi Sultanate from 1266 to 1287. He is known for centralizing the administration and introducing the 'Zia-ul-Millat' policy to strengthen the sultanate's governance.

hindi.explanation: गयासुद्दीन बलबन 1266 से 1287 तक दिल्ली सल्तनत का शासक था। वह अय्यूबी राजवंश के अंतिम शासक थे।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a Fundamental Right in the Constitution of India?

english.explanation: The Right to Property was originally a Fundamental Right under Article 19(1)(f) of the Indian Constitution but was removed in 1978 through the 44th Amendment. It is now a legal right under Article 300A. The other options (Right to Education, Freedom, and Against Exploitation) are explicitly listed as Fundamental Rights.

hindi.explanation: भारत के संविधान में संपत्ति का अधिकार मौलिक अधिकार नहीं है, लेकिन अनुच्छेद 300A इसे विशेष अधिकार के रूप में शामिल करता है। 44वें संविधान संशोधन के बाद यह मौलिक अधिकार वर्गीकृत नहीं है।

questions.original_question: In February 2022, Maharashtra government announced &lsquo;Hope Express&rsquo; initiative to&nbsp;______.

english.explanation: The Maharashtra government's 'Hope Express' initiative, announced in February 2022, aimed to improve air quality in the state by promoting sustainable practices and reducing pollution levels.

hindi.explanation: महाराष्ट्र सरकार द्वारा फरवरी 2022 में 'होप एक्सप्रेस' पहल कैंसर रोकथाम और इलाज से संबंधित है। इसका उद्देश्य लोगों में जागरूकता बढ़ाना है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was awarded the National Nritya Shiromani Award 2022?

english.explanation: Aparna Satheesan was awarded the National Nritya Shiromani Award 2022 for her contributions to Indian classical dance, particularly in the field of Bharatanatyam.

hindi.explanation: राधा रेड्डी को 2022 में राष्ट्रीय नृत्य शिरोमणि पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया था। वह भारतीय नृत्य के क्षेत्र में अपने योगदान के लिए जाने जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which food requires a longer small intestine to digest food?

english.explanation: Herbivores like cows and goats have longer small intestines to digest fibrous plant material such as grass. Carnivores (e.g., lamb, chicken) and omnivores (e.g., humans) require shorter intestines for digesting meat or mixed diets.

hindi.explanation: शाकाहारी पशुओं, जैसे भेड़, के लिए घास पचाने के लिए लंबी छोटी आंत आवश्यक होती है क्योंकि घास में उच्च सेल्यूलोज निहित होता है। इसे तोड़ने के लिए आंत लंबी होती है।

questions.original_question: Yellow card in badminton indicates ____________.

hindi.explanation: बैडमिंटन में पीला कार्ड दुराचार के लिए चेतावनी दर्शाता है। दो बार पीला कार्ड प्राप्त करने पर खिलाड़ी बर्खास्त हो जाता है।

questions.original_question: The national Archives of India came up in the&nbsp;______.

english.explanation: The National Archives of India was established in 1891 to preserve and manage historical records of the Indian government and its predecessors.

hindi.explanation: भारत का राष्ट्रीय अभिलेखागार 1930 में स्थापित हुआ था। यह कलकत्ता में स्थित है और इसका उद्देश्य दस्तावेज भंडारण करना है।

questions.original_question: Personal disposable income (PDI) can be defined as&nbsp;______.

options.value: PI + Personal tax payments + Non-tax payments
PI + Personal tax payments - Non-tax payments
PI - Personal tax payments - Non-tax payments
PI - Personal tax payments + Non-tax payments

english.correct_answer: 3. PI - Personal tax payments - Non-tax payments
english.explanation: Personal Disposable Income (PDI) is calculated by subtracting personal tax payments and non-tax payments (e.g., fines) from Personal Income (PI). This represents the amount available for personal consumption or saving.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. PI - व्यक्तिगत कर भुगतान + गैर-कर भुगतान
hindi.explanation: व्यक्तिगत प्रयोज्य आय (PDI) की गणना व्यक्तिगत आय (PI) से व्यक्तिगत कर भुगतान कम करके और गैर-कर भुगतान जोड़कर की जाती है।

questions.original_question: In India the 1st census was held in the year ______.

english.explanation: The first census in India was conducted in 1872 under the British colonial administration, marking the beginning of systematic population data collection in the country.

hindi.explanation: भारत की पहली जनगणना 1872 में हुई थी। इसका उद्देश्य आबादी का समान रूप से वितरण करना था।

questions.original_question: The Kunbi dance is performed by the tribal community of&nbsp;______.

english.explanation: The Kunbi dance is a traditional folk dance performed by the Kunbi community of Goa, often depicting their agricultural life and cultural heritage.

hindi.explanation: कुनबी नृत्य गोवा के आदिवासी समुदाय द्वारा किया जाता है। यह गोवा के कुनबी आदिवासियों की पारंपरिक नृत्य शैली है।

questions.original_question: A cyclone is known by different names in different parts of the world. In Philippines it is called as&nbsp;_______.

english.explanation: A cyclone is called a typhoon in the Philippines and the western Pacific region. In the Atlantic, it is called a hurricane, and in Australia, a willy-willy.

hindi.explanation: चौसा के युद्ध (1539) में शेर शाह ने हुमायूं को हराया, जो उसके शासन के महत्वपूर्ण मोड़ के रूप में जाना जाता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following defeated Mughal emperor Humayun at Chausa?

english.explanation: Sher Shah Suri defeated Mughal Emperor Humayun at the Battle of Chausa in 1539, marking a significant turning point in the struggle for dominance in northern India.

hindi.explanation: चौसा के युद्ध में शेर शाह ने हुमायूं को हराया और भारतीय इतिहास में मुगल शासन के एक महत्वपूर्ण युद्ध के रूप में विख्यात हो गया।

questions.original_question: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said, &ldquo;Seema Darshan Project adds a new dimension to the tourism sector&rdquo;. This project will boost tourism in&nbsp;______.

english.explanation: The Seema Darshan Project, launched by the Indian government, aims to develop infrastructure and tourism in border areas. Jammu and Kashmir is a border state where this project is being implemented to enhance tourism and economic opportunities.

hindi.explanation: सीमा दर्शन परियोजना गुजरात के भारत-पाकिस्तान सीमा क्षेत्र में पर्यटकों के दर्शन को सुविधाजनक बनाती है। इस परियोजना के तहत सीमा के पास सुविधाएँ विकसित की गई हैं, जिससे पर्यटन बढ़ेगा।

questions.original_question: ______&nbsp;has become the first city in the country to get a processed steel slag (industrial waste) road.

english.explanation: Surat became the first city in India to construct a road using processed steel slag, an industrial waste byproduct. This initiative promotes sustainable use of industrial waste in infrastructure development.

hindi.explanation: सूरत देश का पहला शहर बन गया है, जहाँ प्रसंस्कृत स्टील स्लैग का उपयोग सड़क निर्माण में किया गया है। यह औद्योगिक अपशिष्ट का समुचित उपयोग और पर्यावरण संरक्षण की दिशा में एक महत्वपूर्ण कदम है।

questions.original_question: Which country hosted the first ever Commonwealth Games in 1930?

english.explanation: The first Commonwealth Games were held in Hamilton, Canada, in 1930. The event was then known as the British Empire Games and marked the beginning of the modern Commonwealth Games.

hindi.explanation: 1930 में कनाडा के हैमिल्टन में पहले राष्ट्रमंडल खेलों (तब ब्रिटिश ईम्पीरियल गेम्स) की मेजबानी की गई थी। यह खेल बाद में राष्ट्रमंडल खेलों के रूप में जाने लगे।

questions.original_question: The theory of plate tectonics proposes that the earth&rsquo;s lithosphere is divided into ______&nbsp;major and some minor plates.

english.explanation: The theory of plate tectonics states that the Earth's lithosphere is divided into 7 major plates and several minor plates. These plates are in constant motion, leading to geological phenomena like earthquakes and mountain formation.

hindi.explanation: प्लेट विवर्तनिक सिद्धांत के अनुसार पृथ्वी का स्थलमंडल सात प्रमुख और कई छोटी प्लेटों में विभाजित है। इन प्लेटों का गतिशील होना भूकम्प और पर्वत निर्माण का कारण बनता है।

questions.original_question: Why does one get cramps after sudden physical activity?

options.value: The build-up of hydrochloric acid in our muscles during sudden activity causes cramps.
The pepsin enzyme releases chemicals that lead to cramps.
The build-up of lactic acid in our muscles during sudden activity causes cramps.

english.correct_answer: 4. The build-up of lactic acid in our muscles during sudden activity causes cramps.
english.explanation: During sudden physical activity, muscles may not receive enough oxygen, leading to anaerobic respiration. This process produces lactic acid, which accumulates in muscles and causes cramps.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. अचानक गतिविधि के दौरान हमारी पेशियों में लैक्टिक अम्ल का निर्माण ऐंठन का कारण बनता है।
hindi.explanation: अचानक शारीरिक गतिविधि के दौरान पेशियों में ऑक्सीजन की कमी के कारण लैक्टिक अम्ल का निर्माण होता है, जो ऐंठन का कारण बनता है। इसे पेशीय थकावट के साथ जोड़ा जाता है।

english.explanation: Na is an alkali metal (Group 1). Cu is a transition metal (Groups 3-12). Mg is an alkaline earth metal (Group 2). He is a zero group element (noble gas, Group 18).

hindi.explanation: स्तंभ A के तत्वों का स्तंभ B में समूह से सही मिलान है: Na (सोडियम) - क्षार धातु, Cu (तांबा) - संक्रमण धातु, Mg (मैग्नीशियम) - क्षारीय भू धातु, He (हीलियम) - शून्य समूह तत्व। यह मूल आवर्त सारणी के समूहों पर आधारित है।

questions.original_question: Abdul Karim Khan and Abdul Wahid Khan were the founders of the ______&nbsp;gharana.

english.explanation: Abdul Karim Khan and Abdul Wahid Khan were the founders of the Kirana gharana, a prominent school of Hindustani classical music known for its emphasis on melody and vocal techniques.

hindi.explanation: अब्दुल करीम खान और अब्दुल वाहिद खान किराना घराने के संस्थापक थे। यह घराना भारतीय शास्त्रीय संगीत के विकास में अहम भूमिका निभाया है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following has the credit to invent and create a new style of &lsquo;Bharatanatyam&rsquo;?

english.explanation: Rukmini Devi Arundale is credited with reviving and reforming Bharatanatyam, emphasizing its spiritual and artistic aspects, and making it more accessible to women and the public.

hindi.explanation: रुक्मिणी देवी अरुंडेल ने भरतनाट्यम के पुनर्जागरण और नई शैली के निर्माण में अहम भूमिका निभाई। वे इस नृत्य शैली के प्रमुख प्रचारक माने जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: Puhar or Kaveripattinam, was the port of which of the following dynasty?

english.explanation: Puhar (Kaveripattinam) was a significant port city of the Chola dynasty, serving as a hub for maritime trade and cultural exchange during their reign in South India.

hindi.explanation: कावेरीपट्टिनम एक प्राचीन बंदरगाह था, जिसे चोल वंश द्वारा शासित किया जाता था। यह विश्वव्यापार के लिए प्रसिद्ध था।

questions.original_question: National Dairy Research Institute is located at ______ .

english.explanation: The National Dairy Research Institute (NDRI) is located in Karnal, Haryana. It is a premier institution in India dedicated to dairy research and development.

hindi.explanation: राष्ट्रीय डेयरी अनुसंधान संस्थान हरियाणा के करनाल में स्थित है। यह दूध और डेयरी उत्पादों से संबंधित अनुसंधानों का केंद्र है।

questions.original_question: The HCF of three numbers 72, 108 and 2010 is:

english.explanation: To find the HCF of 72, 108, and 2010, factorize each number into primes: 72 = 2³ × 3², 108 = 2² × 3³, 2010 = 2 × 3 × 5 × 67. The common prime factors are 2¹ and 3¹. Multiplying these gives 2 × 3 = 6. Since 6 divides all three numbers and no higher number does, the HCF is 6.
key_concepts: Common Prime Factors with Minimum Exponents

hindi.explanation: 72, 108 और 2010 का महत्तम समापवर्तक ज्ञात करने के लिए, पहले तीन संख्याओं के अभाज्य गुणनखंड निकाले जाते हैं। 72 = 2³ × 3², 108 = 2² × 3³, 2010 = 2 × 3 × 5 × 67। सामान्य अभाज्य गुणनखंड 2 और 3 हैं, जिनकी न्यूनतम घाते क्रमशः 2¹ और 3¹ हैं। इनका गुणनफल 2 × 3 = 6 है। 6 तीनों संख्याओं को पूरा-पूरा विभाजित करता है, इसलिए यह महत्तम समापवर्तक है।
key_concepts: सामान्य अभाज्य गुणनखंडों की न्यूनतम घातें

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(sec \theta + \frac{1}{cos\theta} = 2 \)</span>, find the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(sec^{55} \theta + \frac{1}{sec ^{55} \theta}\)</span>.

english.explanation: To determine the number of years where the export of commodity P was less than the average, follow these steps: 1. Calculate the total export for all years (2014–2020). 2. Divide the total by 7 to find the average annual export. 3. Count the years where the export value is below this average. If the data shows three years with exports below the calculated average, the correct answer is 3 (option 4).
key_concepts: Comparing data points to an average

hindi.explanation: 2014 से 2020 तक प्रत्येक वर्ष के निर्यात मानों के औसत की गणना करें, फिर पता करें कि कितने वर्षों में निर्यात इस औसत से कम रहा। उदाहरण के लिए, यदि औसत निर्यात 50 करोड़ है और 2014, 2015, 2017 में निर्यात क्रमशः 40, 45, 35 करोड़ है, तो ये तीन वर्ष औसत से कम होंगे। इसलिए, सही उत्तर 3 है।
key_concepts: डेटा के आधार पर निर्णय लेना

questions.original_question: The cost price of an article is ₹800. After allowing a discount of 10%, a gain of 12.5% was made. The marked price of the article is:

english.explanation: The cost price is ₹800. A gain of 12.5% implies the selling price is ₹800 + (12.5% of ₹800) = ₹800 + ₹100 = ₹900. Since a 10% discount is allowed on the marked price (M), the selling price is 90% of M. Thus, 0.9M = ₹900 → M = ₹900 / 0.9 = ₹1,000.
key_concepts: Calculating gain based on cost price
Relating marked price to selling price with discount
लाभ की गणना: लाभ% = (लाभ / क्रय मूल्य) × 100
विक्रय मूल्य की गणना: विक्रय मूल्य = क्रय मूल्य + लाभ
छूट के बाद विक्रय मूल्य: विक्रय मूल्य = अंकित मूल्य × (1 - छूट%)

questions.original_question: The side of an equilateral triangle is 9 cm. What is the radius of the circle circumscribing this equilateral triangle?

english.explanation: In an equilateral triangle, the circumradius (R) can be calculated using the formula R = (a√3)/3, where 'a' is the side length. For a side length of 9 cm, R = (9 × √3)/3 = 3√3 cm. This is derived from the fact that the centroid divides the median in a 2:1 ratio, and the median (altitude) of an equilateral triangle is (√3/2)a. The circumradius is 2/3 of the median, leading to the calculation: R = (2/3) × (9√3/2) = 3√3 cm.
key_concepts: Circumradius of an equilateral triangle: R = (a√3)/3
Centroid divides the median in a 2:1 ratio

An airplane goes 14 km due east and then 48 km due north. How far is it from its initial position?
